description:
Alderbaran is shaken but not stirred. He is wise enough to know when he has met his match and wishes to fight with Seiya no more. He allows the bronze saint to proceed to the third house; the house of Gemini, but when the other bronze saints try to go with him, Alderbaran stops them. His logic is that only Seiya has beaten him, so only Seiya should be allowed to advance. So, the others are forced to fight the stubborn Alderbaran themselves, and together they manage to impress the gold saint and he allows them to run on ahead to join their friend. Moo and Alderbaran have a heart to heart about the bronze saints, and Alderbaran reveals his fondness for them and wishes them well on their quest.  When the bronze four try to enter the house of Gemini, they are unable to find a way in. They decide to split up to save time. Cygnus and Shun are successful and find a way in. Once inside, the gold saint Gemini corners them and informs them that they are now inside his deadly labyrinth and no one has ever escaped with their lives. As Cygnus and Shun try to digest this frightening revelation, we .. .
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gemini Temple! Labyrinth of Light and Darkness
Gêmeos, o labirinto de luz e sombra
Soujikyuu! Hikari to Yami no Meikyuu
¡La casa de los gemelos! El laberinto de luz y oscuridad
双児宮! 光と闇の迷宮
